body:
Add oneAPI packages from the 2021.2 release

I did manual checks of units test, style checking and oneapi-tests on the local machine. 
oneapi-test CI results: https://github.com/DanVev/oneapi-spack-tests/actions/runs/725842061  
All is good except VPL issue, but it a package-wide problem and it might be release-noted etc. 
I'll update the VPL package in case it will be repackaged.

FYI: @rscohn2
title: Integrate oneAPI 2021.2.0 release
